description: Inspects a batch of documents and returns a sentiment analysis for each entity identified in the documents. For more information about targeted sentiment, see Targeted sentiment in the Amazon Comprehend Developer Guide.

parameters.name: TextList
parameters.description: A list containing the UTF-8 encoded text of the input documents. The list can contain a maximum of 25 documents. The maximum size of each document is 5 KB. (string) ---

parameters.name: LanguageCode
parameters.description: The language of the input documents. Currently, English is the only supported language.

nested_items.name: ResultList
nested_items.description: A list of objects containing the results of the operation. The results are sorted in ascending order by the Index field and match the order of the documents in the input list. If all of the documents contain an error, the ResultList is empty.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: The zero-based index of this result in the input list.

nested_items.name: Entities
nested_items.description: An array of targeted sentiment entities.

nested_items.name: DescriptiveMentionIndex
nested_items.description: One or more index into the Mentions array that provides the best name for the entity group.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: Mentions
nested_items.description: An array of mentions of the entity in the document. The array represents a co-reference group. See Co-reference group for an example.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: Model confidence that the entity is relevant. Value range is zero to one, where one is highest confidence.

nested_items.name: GroupScore
nested_items.description: The confidence that all the entities mentioned in the group relate to the same entity.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The text in the document that identifies the entity.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the entity. Amazon Comprehend supports a variety of entity types.

nested_items.name: MentionSentiment
nested_items.description: Contains the sentiment and sentiment score for the mention.

nested_items.name: Sentiment
nested_items.description: The sentiment of the mention.

nested_items.name: SentimentScore
nested_items.description: Describes the level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of its detection of sentiments.

nested_items.name: Positive
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of its detection of the POSITIVE sentiment.

nested_items.name: Negative
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of its detection of the NEGATIVE sentiment.

nested_items.name: Neutral
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of its detection of the NEUTRAL sentiment.

nested_items.name: Mixed
nested_items.description: The level of confidence that Amazon Comprehend has in the accuracy of its detection of the MIXED sentiment.

nested_items.name: BeginOffset
nested_items.description: The offset into the document text where the mention begins.

nested_items.name: EndOffset
nested_items.description: The offset into the document text where the mention ends.

nested_items.name: ErrorList
nested_items.description: List of errors that the operation can return.

nested_items.name: Index
nested_items.description: The zero-based index of the document in the input list.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The numeric error code of the error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A text description of the error.
